snippet: Extortion via kidnapping is a growing problem. Services to fend off kidnappers, negotiate with them or provide ransom insurance are now available.
abstract: Services to deal with kidnapping are now available as abduction and extortion continues to be a growing problem for travelers abroad; business travelers are often targets, with their companies paying a large portion of an estimated half a billion dollars a year in ransom.
